p: Solving V accI ntD esign is challenging due to multiple related factors. Epidemic spread is a very complex phenomenon, and is typically modeled by the SEIR class of non-linear models. Human contacts and mobility play a crucial role in the dynamics of epidemic spread [ 4] [ 9]. Therefore, solving V accI ntD esign requires a combination of the modeling of human mobility and epidemic spread, and designing a strategy for optimizing the allocation of vaccines subject to availability constraints.
